subject: RE: [junit] JUnit / Regression Testing
msgSnippet: ... I suppose it depends on how you define regression testing. To me, regression testing means we always go back and re-run tests for things we tested in the
messageBody:
> Do we refer to Regression Testing when we talk og JUnit ?
> Or is there any other freeware to carry out Regression Testing ?

I suppose it depends on how you define regression testing. To me, regression
testing means we always go back and re-run tests for things we tested in the
past. If you ensure you always re-run all your tests, you're doing
regression testing and this has little to do with the tool that actually
does the testing.

Chris
